code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CarList=()=>{const[cars,setCars]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchCars=async()=>{const res=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/cars');setCars(res.data);};fetchCars();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:cars.map(car=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[car.maker," ",car.model]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",car.rentalPrice,"/day"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Rent"})]},car._id))});};export default CarList;
